A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was extremely disappointed with the movie. Many scenes were clearly not thought out\, leaving many holes in the story line. Comedic relief was not used properly\, creating many awkward moments while watching the movie. You could tell that the director expected you to think these points in the movie were funny or clever\, but his sense of humor in definitely different than mine... and everyone else's. WORST STAR WARS FILM IN FRANCHISE!!!
